subtitleNullable: IMDB user rating & recommendation on 250 anime data
descriptionNullable:
### Context
This data set contains information on user preference data from users on 250 anime. Each user is able to add anime to their completed list and give it a rating and this data set is a compilation of those ratings.

### Content
Anime.csv:

name - full name of anime.
pre-production - Yes/No.
link - link from IMDB.
start year - start year of the production.
end year - end year of the production
runtime - watch time hrs by users.
genre - action/adventure/drama etc.
rating - rating out of 10 this user has assigned.
reviews  -  reviews by the user has assigned.
stars - stars/actors name played the role in anime.
votes - votes were given by the users.


### Inspiration
Building a better anime recommendation & rating system based only on user viewing history.

### If you find this dataset useful, please consider upvoting ❤️
